project.description: 以multiarch/src-openeuler下某个仓为模板，创建或更新multiarch-ci-test/src-openeuler下的测试工程

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cat > hotfix.py << EOF #!/usr/bin/python3 from src.proxy.jenkins_proxy import JenkinsProxy import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET import re import os jp = JenkinsProxy("http://jenkins.jenkins", "$user", "$token") path_list = ["trigger", "x86-64", "aarch64", "comment"]
for item in path_list: template_job = os.path.join("multiarch/src-openeuler/", item, "$job") target_job = os.path.join("multiarch-ci-test/src-openeuler/", item, "$job") print(template_job) config = jp.get_config(template_job) root = ET.fromstring(config) ele = root.findall("builders/hudson.tasks.Shell/command") if ele: replaced_text = re.sub(r"#!/bin/bash", "#!/bin/bash\nrepo_owner={}".format("'$repo_owner'"), ele[0].text) if replaced_text == ele[0].text: replaced_text = "\n".join("repo_owner='$repo_owner'", ele[0].text) ele[0].text = replaced_text ele = root.find("triggers//regexpFilterExpression") if ele is not None: ele.text = re.sub(r"src-openeuler", "$repo_owner", ele.text) ele = root.find("publishers/hudson.plugins.parameterizedtrigger.BuildTrigger//projects") if ele is not None: ele.text = re.sub(r"multiarch/src-openeuler/", "multiarch-ci-test/src-openeuler/", ele.text) ele = root.find("publishers/join.JoinTrigger//projects") if ele is not None: ele.text = re.sub(r"multiarch/src-openeuler/", "multiarch-ci-test/src-openeuler/", ele.text) config = ET.tostring(root).decode("utf-8") if "${action}" == "create": jp.create_job(target_job, config) else: jp.update_job(target_job, config)
EOF
rm -rf /home/jenkins/ci_check2 git clone -b master https://gitee.com/openeuler/openeuler-jenkins /home/jenkins/ci_check2
export PYTHONPATH=/home/jenkins/ci_check2 python3 hotfix.py
